sequences.name: Swap Binaries
commands: sudo apt-get  -o Dpkg::Options::="--force-confdef" -o Dpkg::Options::="--force-confold" -y install aptitude

sudo apt-get -o Dpkg::Options::="--force-confdef" -o Dpkg::Options::="--force-confold" -y install dse-full=6.8.0-1 dse=6.8.0-1 dse-libgraph=6.8.0-1 dse-libsolr=6.8.0-1 dse-libtomcat=6.8.0-1 dse-liblog4j=6.8.0-1 dse-libspark=6.8.0-1 dse-libcassandra=6.8.0-1 dse-libhadoop2-client-native=6.8.0-1 dse-libhadoop2-client=6.8.0-1
